## ResolverContext.resolve() method

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

        uri: null;
        parentPackageJson?: {
            packageJson: PackageJson;
            uri: Uri;
        } | undefined;
    } & {
        visited: ResolverContext.Visit[];
    }) | ({
        found: true;
        uri: null;
        parentPackageJson?: {
            packageJson: PackageJson;
            uri: Uri;
        } | undefined;
        rootUri: Uri;
    } & {
        visited: ResolverContext.Visit[];
    }) | ({
        found: true;
        uri: Uri;
        parentPackageJson?: {
            packageJson: PackageJson;
            uri: Uri;
        } | undefined;
        rootUri: Uri;
    } & {
        visited: ResolverContext.Visit[];

```
